mapper.select: SELECT b.product_brand AS brand, COUNT(b.order_no) AS orderCount,SUM(IFNULL(b.product_num,0)) AS nums, SUM(IFNULL(a.total_amount,0)) AS amount FROM oms_order a LEFT JOIN order_detail b ON a.order_no = b.order_no WHERE a.order_status = 3 AND b.product_brand IS NOT NULL GROUP BY b.product_brand ORDER BY orderCount DESC
